From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Ironhide nods, as do many Autobots in aproval, but one can be heard in
an uproar. Ironhide turns his head to his side, and looks down, to see
the centre of the disturbance. One very large Autobot had already
smashed his desk, and was standing at his full height, very upset.
Ironhide knew he was in for trouble, "Is there a problem Grimlock?" He
asked, knowing there is. "YES THERE PROBLEM" Grimlock yelled, his voice
echoing very clearly throughout all of Iocon. "THIS BULLSHIT. YOU SEND
ROOKIES TO FIGHT IN WAR THAT AFFECT WHOLE GALAXY, EVEN WHOLE TIME. YOU
SEND A PACIFIST!!" he declared in rage, as he pointed a finger at
Pacifix. He pulled out his energon sword, and in one swipe, cleaved his
whole rows podium straight in half. Grimlock stopped and looked up at
the main council, his sword at his side, energy shimmering off it.

Ironhide sighed, how did he get a weapon in this room. This wasnt the
first time this happened. "Grimlock, you know that if one of us goes the
Predacons will be on to us," He said calmly. "None of us can go".

Grimlock looked back up, then crossed his arms, his sword just above his
head, still shimmering, the energy intesifing the look of rage in his
crimson eyes. "Then I go to earth to" he said quietly, and he was almost
not heard with the large amount of gasps that escaped around the room.
